extDescription.message: Get live quotes and charts for stocks and securities of your choice from Bloomberg, Google and Yahoo! at the click of a button!

instructions1_1.message: Add securities to the list below. You can delete securities from your list by clearing the fields or clicking the delete button (

instructions1_2.message: ), and rows can be dragged and dropped to rearrange them.

instructions2.message: Valid alert conditions look like >10, <=5, <1 and so forth. A notification will pop up when the value passes that limit.

instructions3_1.message: To help conserve screen real estate, if quote information is enabled within web pages, items with an unchecked box (

instructions3_2.message: ) next to them will be hidden.

syncLabel1.message: Sync across computers (no effect if you use only one PC). Requires Chrome bookmark syncing turned on. (

insertIntoPages.message: Embed quote information in top right corner of web page. (Note: This will not work in the Chrome Web Store or any extension pages.)

behaviorPopup.message: When I click a quote in the browser popup window,

behaviorInject.message: When I click a quote in the in-webpage window,

viewChart.message: View chart (Shift+Click to go to quote URL)

goToPage.message: Go to quote URL (Shift+Click to view chart)

resetConfirm.message: Are you sure you wish to reset your list of security IDs?

clearConfirm.message: Are you sure you wish to clear your list of security IDs?

syncNow.message:
Would you like to use the previous sync information?
OK = Overwrite current settings with sync data
Cancel = Keep current settings

makeVisible.message: Make me visible in embedded quote information

deletePortfolio.message: Are you sure you'd like to delete this portfolio?

netInstructions.message: Use this for help if you have restrictions on bandwidth usage or a slow connection. The easiest solution is to use Bloomberg as your primary source.
